CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Misty Meadow Acres relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Misty Meadow Acres is {above} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Misty Meadow Acres?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Misty Meadow Acres in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Misty Meadow Acres}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Misty Meadow Acres's maximum Organic Farming Area in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Misty Meadow Acres's maximum Organic Farming Area is in {1991}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Organic Farming Area in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Organic Farming Area is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1978, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1965 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between 1967 and 1978 was {smaller} than between 1965 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Organic Farming Area in 1967 higher or lower than in 1978?
NC.A: The total organic farming area in 1967 was {higher} than in 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1994, was the average total Organic Farming Area higher or lower than between 1973 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total organic farming area between 1993 and 1994 was {higher} than between 1973 and 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1977, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between 1971 and 1977 was {smaller} than between 1989 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Misty Meadow Acres} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironwood Ranch and Golden Harvest Cooperative first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironwood Ranch and Golden Harvest Cooperative first exchanged leading positions in {1967}.
